[[זבן]] Lzb:266; Lzb:268 SAC:48. 49);—abs. ´[[ז]]: Da 2:16, Da 7:12; emph. [[זִמְנׇא]] Ezr 5:3 +; pl. abs. Da 6:11 +, emph. [[זִמְנַיׇּא]] Da 2:21;—time: specified time Da 2:16; appointed time Da 7:12, Da 7:22, cf. Da 2:21; [[בֵּהּ זִמְנׇא]] at that time Ezr 5:3, Da 3:7, Da 3:8, Da 4:33; (festival) seasons Da 7:25; time, occurrence, Da 6:11, Da 6:14 three times in the day.
